price: 104. Wax abaalgud ahna kuma weydiisatid  (Qur’aan)kani darti; (Qur’aankani) wax kale ma aha aan aheyn waanada Caalamka.
arabic: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illā dhik'run lil'ʿālamīna
